reasoning: Aggregate BOTEC estimate summing major developmental bone diseases: osteogenesis imperfecta (~1.5 per 100k), achondroplasia (~2.5 per 100k), hypophosphatasia (~1 per 100k), thanatophoric dysplasia and other skeletal dysplasias (~1.5 per 100k). Total ~6.5 per 100k. Low confidence due to heterogeneous umbrella term with significant variation in severity, prognosis, and epidemiology across subcategories.
